title: cmd/compile/ssa: broken build due to racewalk/recover interaction
body:
CL 11238 ("Handle variables correctly") broke the SSA build.

CL 11681 adds some diagnostics and extra checks for it.

The problem appears to be that, when compiling a function including a call to `recover` with the race detector enabled, `nodfp` in the call to `gorecover` does not match `nodfp` at the time that the SSA backend is invoked.

As a result, s.addr(nodfp) returns nil, but values cannot have nil args. Breakage ensues.

I don't know what the right fix is. Leaving for @randall77.
